comment: Well, sorta. But hand washing before, after, and frequent hand sanitizer throughout the day, plus no sharing of food or drink, no kisses (especially no kisses involving spit), and spraying down the booth with Lysol about :30 am. It worked! was Awful.
amr:
# ::snt Well, sorta. But hand washing before, after, and frequent hand sanitizer throughout the day, plus no sharing of food or drink, no kisses (especially no kisses involving spit), and spraying down the booth with Lysol about :30 am. It worked! was Awful.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / well
            :mod (s / sorta))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (w2 / wash-01
                              :ARG1 (h / hand)
                              :time (b / before)
                              :time (a3 / after))
                        :op2 (s2 / sanitize-01
                              :ARG1 h
                              :ARG1-of (f / frequent-02)
                              :duration (d / day))
                        :op3 (s3 / share-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG1 (o / or
                                    :op1 (f2 / food)
                                    :op2 (d2 / drink)))
                        :op4 (k / kiss-01
                              :polarity -
                              :mod (e / especially)
                              :ARG2-of (ii / involve-01
                                    :ARG1 (s4 / spit-01)))
                        :op5 (s5 / spray-01
                              :ARG1 (b2 / booth)
                              :ARG2 (d3 / down)
                              :instrument (p / product
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Lysol"))
                              :time (a4 / about
                                    :op1 (d4 / date-entity
                                          :time ":30")))))
            :snt3 (a5 / awful
                  :mode expressive)))
